name: The Loneliest Whale
description:
A small game made in a month as a challenge to myself.

The ocean is vast and full of live. But you seem to be the only whale living in it. Day in and day out you send out messages but nothing returns. Until you hear faint voices in the distant.

Search for other whales in the big ocean with your echolocation and avoid the whalers patroulling the ocean.
